dialogs.schedule.email.save.error.value: Failed to save the schedule. Try again later.

dialogs.save.as.new.desc.value: Give your new dashboard a new descriptive name, so it's easier to find it later on.

dialogs.save.as.new.alertsAndEmailsMessa.value: Alerts and email schedules will not be duplicated

dialogs.save.as.new.emailsMessage.value: Email schedules will not be duplicated

filters.day.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {DAY} other {#D}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#d}', wrong '{#d.}').

filters.week.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {WEEK} other {#W}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#w}', wrong '{#w.}').

filters.month.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {MONTH} other {#M}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#m}', wrong '{#m.}').

filters.quarter.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {QUARTER} other {#Q}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#q}', wrong '{#q.}').

filters.year.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {YEAR} other {#Y}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#y}', wrong '{#y.}').

filters.alertMessage.relativePreset.inPe.comment: Don't translate placeholders '{calendarIcon}', '{range}'. Example text: 'in period (calendar) from 2 months ago to 2 months ahead'

filters.alertMessage.relativePreset.rang.comment: In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS DAY} =1 {LAST DAY} other {LAST # DAYS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.
In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS WEEK} =1 {LAST WEEK} other {LAST # WEEKS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.
In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS MONTH} =1 {LAST MONTH} other {LAST # MONTHS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.
In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS QUARTER} =1 {LAST QUARTER} other {LAST # QUARTERS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.
In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS YEAR} =1 {LAST YEAR} other {LAST # YEARS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.

kpi.noData.value: No data for current filter settings. Try changing the filters.

dialogs.schedule.email.filters.value: Dashboard contains filter changes that will be saved in the schedule.

dialogs.schedule.email.attachment.filter.comment: Keep the parentheses. Attachment with filters included.

dialogs.schedule.email.attachment.select.comment: Label of a button that opens attachment selection

dialogs.schedule.email.headline.comment: Translate as imperative. Schedule emailing whole KPI dashboard.

dialogs.schedule.email.heading.comment: Translate as imperative. Schedule exporting whole dashboard and insights

dialogs.schedule.email.unsubscribed.reci.value: {n, plural, one {1 recipient unsubscribed} other {# recipients unsubscribed}} from this schedule.
dialogs.schedule.email.unsubscribed.reci.comment: Translate only 'recipient unsubscribed'/'recipients unsubscribed' and 'from this schedule.' to form a proper sentence with correct plural form for given language

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.label.comment: Count of repeats of the scheduled email.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.execute.o.comment: Example 'on day 2 of January'. Placeholder '{date}' refers to ordinal number of day of the month. Don't translate placeholder '{date}'.
Example: 'on the first Friday'. Translate only uppercase in 'ON THE {week, select, 1 {FIRST} 2 {SECOND} 3 {THIRD} 4 {FOURTH} other {LAST}} {day}'

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.every.comment: Example 'every 1 month'. FIXME: This needs to be split into variants 'every day', 'every week', ... since some languages uses different gramatical gender for the 'every' based on the subject.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.frequenci.comment: Translate only uppercase in '{n, plural, one {DAY} other {DAYS}}'.
Translate only uppercase in '{n, plural, one {MONTH} other {MONTHS}}'.
Translate only uppercase in '{n, plural, one {WEEK} other {WEEKS}}'.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.types.cus.comment: Repeats the schedule email using custom rules defined by the user.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.types.mon.comment: Example: 'Monthly on the first Friday'. Translate only uppercase in 'MONTHLY ON THE {week, select, 1 {FIRST} 2 {SECOND} 3 {THIRD} 4 {FOURTH} other {LAST}} {day}'

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.types.wee.comment: Example: 'Weekly on Friday'. Placeholder '{day}' refers to a day of a week. Don't translate placeholder '{day}'.

dialogs.schedule.email.time.label.comment: Translate as imperative. Date time of the schedule email.

dialogs.schedule.email.message.placehold.value:
Hello,

Your scheduled email is ready. You can download the dashboard in attachments.
dialogs.schedule.email.message.placehold.comment:
Don't translate '

' which adds 2 new lines to the text.

dialogs.schedule.email.save.comment: Translate as imperative. It's caption of a button for saving scheduled mail

dialogs.schedule.email.format.options.comment: Header of a formatting dialog. Not an imperative!

dialogs.schedule.email.insight.format|re.comment: Label of a dropdown for selecting export format

dialogs.schedule.management.recipients.comment: Translate only uppercase in '{n, plural, one {# RECIPIENT} other {# RECIPIENTS}}'.

dialogs.schedule.management.recipients.o.comment: There is no other recipient than you.

dialogs.schedule.management.attachments..comment: Translate only uppercase in '{n, plural, one {# INSIGHT} other {# INSIGHTS}}'.

dialogs.schedule.management.attachments..comment: In '{n, plural, one {# INSIGHT} other {# INSIGHTS}}', translate only uppercase words.

dialogs.schedule.management.attachments..value: Dashboard and {n, plural, one {# report} other {# reports}}
dialogs.schedule.management.attachments..comment: In '{n, plural, one {# REPORT} other {# REPORTS}}', translate only uppercase words.

dashboard.shareDialog.underLenientContro.value: Other users can access this dashboard if they drill to it
dashboard.shareDialog.underLenientContro.comment: Label of checkbox that sets if other users than the ones in the list above the checkbox will be able to access the dashboard if they drill into it from another dashboard.

dashboard.shareDialog.lock.label.value: Only admins can edit this dashboard
dashboard.shareDialog.lock.label.comment: Label of checkbox that sets edit right for the dashboard

header.lockStatus.tooltip.value: This dashboard is locked. Only administrators can edit this dashboard.
header.lockStatus.tooltip.comment: Shown when hovering over lock indicator. Dont translate html tags ,

header.shareStatus.shared.text.comment: Share indicator text when dashboard is shared with someone

header.shareStatus.shared.tooltip.value: This dashboard is shared with other users.
header.shareStatus.shared.tooltip.comment: Shown when hovering over share indicator of public dashboard.

header.shareStatus.private.text.comment: Share indicator text when dashboard is private

header.shareStatus.private.strict.toolti.value: Only you can view and edit this dashboard.
header.shareStatus.private.strict.toolti.comment: Shown when hovering over share indicator of private dashboard and strict access.

header.shareStatus.private.not.strict.to.value: The creator can edit this dashboard. Other users with appropriate user roles can edit this dashboard when they drill to it.
header.shareStatus.private.not.strict.to.comment: Shown when hovering over share indicator of private dashboard and not strict access.

dashboard.shareDialog.removeAccessGrante.comment: Text of the tooltip shown above button that removes user or group dashboard access right.

dashboard.shareDialog.removeAccessCreato.value: The user that created this dashboard. Creators cannot be removed.
dashboard.shareDialog.removeAccessCreato.comment: Text of the tooltip shown above disabled button that removes user dashboard access right. Shown in the case when user cannot be removed because he is the creator of the dashboard.

attributesDropdown.placeholder.comment: Use '…' as one character, not 3 dots ('...').

attributesDropdown.noData.value: This attribute does not have any value.

attributesDropdown.configuration.comment: Configuration button label in attribute filter dropdown

attributesDropdown.itemsFiltered.comment: This message is displayed when attribute elements are being filtered out by parent filters

attributesDropdown.allItemsFiltered.comment: This message is displayed when there are no items available because they were filtered out by parent filters

attributesDropdown.itemsFiltered.tooltip.comment: Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <> and {filters} placeholder as it will be replaced by list of filter names.

attributesDropdown.save.comment: Save button label in attribute filter dropdown configuration

attributesDropdown.filterBy.comment: Filter section label in attribute filter dropdown configuration

attributesDropdown.displayValuesAs.comment: Filter section label in attribute filter dropdown configuration. Displayed before dropdown button that changes form of the attribute used in insight. For example 'Display as: Shortened name'.

attributesDropdown.attributeNameWithData.comment: Will be used in sentence between two nouns. For instance 'Filter by AttributeX with data of MetricY'

attributesDropdown.noConnectionMessage.value: {childTitle} cannot be filtered by {parentTitle}. There is no connection between the filter attributes in the data model.
attributesDropdown.noConnectionMessage.comment: Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <> and placeholders enclosed in {}.

attributesDropdown.filterConfiguredMessa.value: {parentTitle} is already filtered by {childTitle} filter directly or through other filters.
attributesDropdown.filterConfiguredMessa.comment: Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <> and placeholders enclosed in {}.

attributesDropdown.removeTooltip.comment: Tooltip text of button for deleting filter
